entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.JSon Source Generator Diagnostic in the error list is doesnt link me to docs or navigate me to the file where the issue is #60314
  • .net Core Runtimes - Display Icon Registry suggestion #60311
  • Singlefile+composite test is failing in SDK repo #60308
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-41355 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #60301
  • Hosting multiple instances of an app published with PublishSingleFile and IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract does not work as expected. #60300
  • RyuJIT: Invalidly optimized negated division #60297
    7.0.0
  • Subsequent Grpc calls with WinHttpHandler to an IIS hosted service fail #60291
  • System.ArgumentException : Font '?' cannot be found. on openSUSE docker #60290
  • Trialing an Automated Issue Culling Experiment #60288
    7.0.0
  • BrowserHttpHandler can't stream large responses even with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60287
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60293
    7.0.0
  • In mono arm64, when creating a delegate that returns 16byte-size-struct, the generated code is wrong #60282
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\xxobj\\operand\\refanyval\\refanyval.cmd #60278

Closed

  • Add string indexers for JsonElement #60279
    7.0.0
  • JIT: optimize (T)x | (T)y to (T)(x | y) #13816
    Future
  • .NET misreports current culture after upgrading to .NET6 #60296
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_GetSetTimes.CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #58916
    Future
  • Do not double-return arrays to ArrayPool #33767
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Regression: [JsonIgnore] Attribute not Applied to Ref Returns #59936
    6.0.0
  • Regression in File.PreallocationSize #59705
    6.0.0
  • Missing build dependencies not written to console #315
    Future
  • Create spec/doc for JSON serialization #60178
  • Date Format UK #60286
    Future
  • WASM leg failed in CI - RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #59911
  • Review #nullable disable files in Common directory #41439
    7.0.0
  • Thread.Priority ignored on Linux? #60114
  • Failed to compile CLR #60241
  • [interp] Short branch offset can overflow with very large methods #57363
    7.0.0
  • Use file allocation size where it's beneficial #51116
    7.0.0
  • Allow for atomic appends to end of file #53432
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose SafeFileHandle.CanSeek #58370
    7.0.0
  • dbgshim is broken in .NET 6.0-rc1 Windows X86 #60215
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60319
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #60318
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [release/6.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60317
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Implement RSA-PSS signature for CmsSigner #60316
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60315
  • [metadata] Replace uses of MonoType:byref by a getter #60313
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Remove DIV(NEG(a), C) => DIV(a, NEG(C)) opt #60312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports proj file for pa… #60310
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Package Validation dependency and update Suppression files #60306
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix type layout diagnostics in the CoreCLR runtime #60305
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Alternative fix of #60182 #60298
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    community-contribution
  • Only set PATH on native architecture #60276
    * NO MERGE *, breaking-change, area-Infrastructure-installer, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • fix for generation info in GCMemoryInfo #60309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60307
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60299
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #60280
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [hack] Add script to run local Roslyn build on non-Windows #60304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some Antigen pipeline fixes #60284
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60244
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Checkin the work for coreclr around stackalloc, ref fields and arbitrary generics to hackathon tree #60303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use local version of Roslyn to build #60302
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Fix failures happening in CI on PEImage::LoadFlat/LoadImage #60277
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fixing compilation on windows using debug mode. #60260
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Reflection
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #60084
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-approved
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
